title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 496.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 496.2 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part
applies to all parts of the State and to all State agencies, offices, authorities, and divisions in the context of programs, regulations, decisions, and planning documents specified in the Climate Leadership and Community

Protection Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
496.2

Adopted

New

York State Register December 30, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 52, eff. 12/30/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
